location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 63 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter notes that the vessel carrying Beaumont's previous letter to Bussora [Basra] was detained at Grain [Kuwait] on suspicion of having property on board that belonged to the Chaub [the Banu Ka'b tribal confederacy]. The letter also reports political and military developments in Persia and the on-going power struggle there. Shipped by Hadjee Rashed's Dow.
